briefTitle: Study of Ibrutinib Combined With Venetoclax in Subjects With Mantle Cell Lymphoma (MCL)
officialTitle: Phase 3 Study of Ibrutinib in Combination With Venetoclax in Subjects With Mantle Cell Lymphoma

interventions.name: Placebo Oral tablet to match Venetoclax

summary: This Phase 3 multinational, randomized, double-blind study is designed to compare the efficacy and safety of the combination of ibrutinib and venetoclax vs. ibrutinib and placebo in subjects with MCL.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Tumor Lysis Syndrome (TLS) Events (Safety Run-in)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: After at least 3 months of treatment, with an overall median treatment duration of 20.0 months

effectByArm.arm: Safety Run-in: Increased TLS Risk at Baseline
Safety Run-in: Low TLS Risk at Baseline
